title: Elijah vs. the Prophets of Baal
summary: Elijah challenges 450 prophets of Baal to a showdown on Mount Carmel. God answers Elijahâ€™s prayer with fire from heaven, proving He is the true God. The people repent and the drought ends after Elijah prays.

faq.question: What happened on Mount Carmel?
faq.answer: Elijah called down fire from heaven, proving God is real and Baal is false.

faq.question: What happened after the people saw the fire?
faq.answer: They fell on their faces, declared the Lord as God, and Elijah had the false prophets executed.
